criteria: Understanding of FDA-approved Condoms: Demonstrates comprehension of what constitutes an FDA-approved condom and its significance.
Application of Decision-Making Process: Employs a structured decision-making process to evaluate the use of condoms.
Evaluation of Pregnancy Prevention: Assesses the effectiveness of condoms in preventing pregnancy.
Evaluation of STD Prevention: Assesses the effectiveness of condoms in preventing STDs.
Consideration of Value: Evaluates the overall value (benefits vs. drawbacks) of using condoms.
